Lady Pastel, is something the matter?\""},{"lineNumber":212007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No...\""},{"lineNumber":212008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこの、魔王の子……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You there, child of the Demon King...\""},{"lineNumber":212009,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とりあえず、問答無用で襲ってきたり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For now, make sure you don't attack without question,"},{"lineNumber":212010,"originalJapaneseLine":"　放火したりはせんようじゃな、と……」","translatedEnglishLine":"or set fires, I hope...\""},{"lineNumber":212011,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、話くらいは出来るようじゃ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, it seems you can at least talk."},{"lineNumber":212012,"originalJapaneseLine":"　感心感心」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm impressed, very impressed.\""},{"lineNumber":212013,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故か椅子に座っただけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, just by sitting in a chair,"},{"lineNumber":212014,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの好感度が上がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"your favorability increased."},{"lineNumber":212015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お前の父ちゃんと母ちゃんなんなの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Who exactly are your father and mother?\""},{"lineNumber":212016,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".................\""},{"lineNumber":212017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……何をしておる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What are you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":212018,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、これ空気椅子……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that's an invisible chair...\""},{"lineNumber":212019,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは立ったまま、","translatedEnglishLine":"You, still standing,"},{"lineNumber":212020,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場で直角に膝を折り、","translatedEnglishLine":"bent your knees at a right angle on the see..."},{"lineNumber":212024,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの男と法王の子じゃな」","translatedEnglishLine":"You are the child of that man and the Cardinal, aren't you?\""},{"lineNumber":212025,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故か納得された。","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, they were convinced."},{"lineNumber":212026,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お前の父ちゃんと母ちゃんなんなの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...So who exactly are your father and mother?\""},{"lineNumber":212027,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、貴様がそれでいいなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, if that suits you,"},{"lineNumber":212028,"originalJapaneseLine":"　妾から言うことはない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have nothing more to say.\""},{"lineNumber":212029,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".................\""},{"lineNumber":212030,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何をしておる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What are you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":212031,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはパステルの太ももの上に","translatedEnglishLine":"You sat down on Pastel's lap."},{"lineNumber":212032,"originalJapaneseLine":"腰を下ろした。","translatedEnglishLine":"You lowered your hips."},{"lineNumber":212033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わわわ、＜エール＞様！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah wah wah, Lord <Yell>!?\""},{"lineNumber":212034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クク……ククク……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuku... kukuku..."},{"lineNumber":212035,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やはり、あの二人の子供よなぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You really are the child of those two, aren't you...\""},{"lineNumber":212036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「殺すー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll kill you!\""},{"lineNumber":212037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あわわわー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah wah wah!?\""},{"lineNumber":212038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「パステル様、どうか落ち着いて下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Pastel, please calm down.\""},{"lineNumber":212039,"originalJapaneseLine":"イージスがパステルを後ろから羽交い締めにする。","translatedEnglishLine":"Aegis held Pastel in a rear chokehold."},{"lineNumber":212040,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいや！　呪う！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No! I curse you!\""},{"lineNumber":212041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「生きていることを後悔するような！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With a curse so cruel,"},{"lineNumber":212042,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えっぐい呪いをかけるのじゃー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"you'll regret being alive!\""},{"lineNumber":212043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「国際問題になります」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This will become an international incident.\""},{"lineNumber":212044,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふは、ふはははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fuhaha, fuhahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":212045,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それがどーした！」","translatedEnglishLine":"So what if it does!\""},{"lineNumber":212046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シャングリラの都市長が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The mayor of Shangri-La city"},{"lineNumber":212047,"originalJapaneseLine":"　舐められたまま黙っている方が","translatedEnglishLine":"remaining silent while being insulted"},{"lineNumber":212048,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よっぽど国際問題になるわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"would be a far bigger international issue!\""},{"lineNumber":212049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、イージス！　離さぬかー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Aegis! Let go of me!\""},{"lineNumber":212050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わわー！　馬鹿馬鹿＜エール＞！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah wah! Foolish, foolish <Yell>!"},{"lineNumber":212051,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一時撤退するぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's make a temporary retreat!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とは言え、それは妾達の間の話……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That said, that's a matter between us..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供の代にまで恨みを持続させようとは思わぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no intention of letting grudges last into the next generation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジロリと、パステルがあなたを睨んだ。
話くらいなら聞いてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will at least listen to what you have to say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキー達が椅子に座る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky and the others sat on their chairs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　パステル様、どうかなさいましただすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? Lady Pastel, is something the matter?"
"You there, child of the Demon King..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とりあえず、問答無用で襲ってきたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, make sure you don't attack without question,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 放火したりはせんようじゃな、と……」
「うむ、話くらいは出来るようじゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it seems you can at least talk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故か椅子に座っただけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, just by sitting in a chair,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの好感度が上がった。
「……お前の父ちゃんと母ちゃんなんなの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Who exactly are your father and mother?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場で直角に膝を折り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: bent your knees at a right angle on the spot,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぷるぷると震えていた。
あの男と法王の子じゃな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are the child of that man and the Cardinal, aren't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……お前の父ちゃんと母ちゃんなんなの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So who exactly are your father and mother?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、貴様がそれでいいなら、
妾から言うことはない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have nothing more to say."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはパステルの太ももの上に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You sat down on Pastel's lap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やはり、あの二人の子供よなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really are the child of those two, aren't you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パステル様、どうか落ち着いて下さい」
イージスがパステルを後ろから羽交い締めにする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aegis held Pastel in a rear chokehold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「生きていることを後悔するような！
えっぐい呪いをかけるのじゃー！」
舐められたまま黙っている方が
よっぽど国際問題になるわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would be a far bigger international issue!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、イージス！　離さぬかー！」
「わわー！　馬鹿馬鹿＜エール＞！

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

あの男と法王の子じゃな」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……お前の父ちゃんと母ちゃんなんなの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So who exactly are your father and mother?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、貴様がそれでいいなら、
妾から言うことはない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have nothing more to say."
